actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: Shoots up to two different eye rays at creatures within 90 ft., each usable once per turn: Confusion Ray (DC 13 WIS, can't react; on turn can't move and must attack random creature), Paralyzing Ray (DC 13 CON or paralyzed 1 minute, repeat saves end), Fear Ray (DC 13 WIS or frightened 1 minute, repeat saves with disadvantage if visible), Wounding Ray (DC 13 CON, 16 (3d10) necrotic, half on save).

actions.name: Create Food and Water
actions.description: Creates food and water to sustain itself for 24 hours.

reactions.name: Spell Reflection
reactions.description: When it succeeds on a spell save or a spell attack misses, chooses a creature within 30 ft.; spell targets that creature instead (new save/attack as appropriate).
